txt.en: 'Your discoveries at Sâd Doldúr will be of interest to Faerchiril at Barad Angol. You should go to her at once with your report...the darkness stirring there cannot be permitted to continue.'

'I have long feared that the blight which has befallen the Ashenslades and the rise of the fell spirits are due to the foul sorcerers dwelling in the ruins below.

'Our worst fear is that the blight is spreading westward across Mirkwood, and sadly, this appears to be the case. It is good to hear that the blight has not corrupted the ancient stones below; however, I still fear for the trees.

'We must put a stop to this evil before it is too late.'
'Speak with Faerchiril, [placeholder], and offer any help you may'
The camp at Sâd Doldúr proved to be a terrible place, full of sorcerers and fell spirits. Worse yet, it appears to be the source of the blight in the Ashenslades.
Talk to Faerchiril at Barad Angol
Faerchiril is at Barad Angol.\n\nHimeirion has asked you to tell the Elf-scholar Faerchiril about your findings in Sâd Doldúr.
